title: Vaccines for Your Children: Protect Your Child at Every Age
description: Vaccines help protect infants, children and teens from harmful diseases.
sitename: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
cleaned_text: Vaccines by Age Vaccines are recommended throughout your child's life to protect against serious, sometimes deadly diseases.
